name: Sol Lewitt vs Jackson Pollock Generator
description: Refresh to generate a unique composition each time. Influenced by the procedural wall drawings of Sol Lewitt and the densely layered strokes of Jackson Pollock. Once enough layers are built up, the work starts to look more and more fractal-like and natural, which science has shown happened in Pollock's work too, with his creations resembling nature's fractal patterns.
